description: This file defines a React Native screen component called NoteDetailScreen, which displays details of a note, including title, content, last updated time, and actions for editing or deleting the note. It interacts with a local database for fetching and deleting notes and utilizes navigation to move between screens.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Asynchronously fetches the note with the given id from the database and updates the component state.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Handles the deletion of the current note with user confirmation; if confirmed, deletes the note from the database and navigates back.
